text: In this policy, we lay out: what data we collect and why; how your data is handled; and your rights to your data.
We do use persistent first-party cookies to store certain preferences, make it easier for you to use our applications, and support some in-house analytics.
When you install an app developed by SKlabs Software Ltd, we store your email address to identify you as a customer.

What we collect and why

Website interactions

When you browse our marketing pages or applications, your browser automatically shares certain information such as which operating system and browser version you are using.
We also store any information you volunteer like surveys.
